title: MASK Architects’ Solaris Motorcycle Unfolds Solar Wings to Charge Itself in the Wilderness
description: ARTICLE – Every adventure motorcyclist knows the math. You calculate fuel range, map gas stations, and accept that eventually the wilderness wins. Run out of fuel fifty miles from the nearest pump and your dual-sport becomes a very expensive piece of sculptur…
